mention.text: the longest-held of the Western hostages in Lebanon
Anderson , chief Middle East correspondent for the Associated Press
the ninth Western hostage to be freed since August
Terry Anderson missed during his time in captivity
an honor I 'd have gladly given up long ago
the other two American hostages freed this week.
his captors came to his cell Tuesday afternoon with new clothes -- the first new apparel he had worn in almost seven years -- and a pair of new shoes that were pinching his feet.
Iranians , Israelis and the Lebanese kidnappers.
only one of the styles to confront
